Title: Night
Writer: Margaret Atwood (based on the novel by), Nina Fiore (executive story editor), John Hererra (executive story editor), Bruce Miller (created by)
Actors: Elisabeth Moss, Joseph Fiennes, Yvonne Strahovski, Madeline Brewer
Plot: When a punishment is handed down for Janine, June and the other handmaids must face the unthinkable. Serena discovers Fred's secrets. Meanwhile, Moira makes it into Canada.
